Yes, tx_lookup loading is very slow (.Put calls) - because of nature of data, use crypto-hash as a key - it is worst case for inserts/deletes (you basically copy whole bucket). 
10K blocks (2M transactions) rewind took 8 minutes (40 sec commit, 1 sec fsync) on macbook's ssd.
